title: The Green Guardian: The Adventures of Frank King
summary: Frank King, a marketing expert with a passion for gardening, discovers he has the power to control plants and uses it to fight crime and protect his city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Frank King, ein Marketingexperte mit einer Leidenschaft für Gartenarbeit, entdeckt, dass er die Fähigkeit besitzt, Pflanzen zu kontrollieren, und nutzt sie, um Verbrechen zu bekämpfen und seine Stadt zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Frank King, een marketingexpert met een passie voor tuinieren, ontdekt dat hij planten kan beheersen en gebruikt dit om misdaden te bestrijden en zijn stad te beschermen gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Frank King, un expert en marketing passionné de jardinage, découvre qu'il a le pouvoir de contrôler les plantes et l'utilise pour lutter contre le crime et protéger sa ville pendant une semaine.

story.text: In the heart of a bustling city, Frank King, a 24-year-old marketing coordinator, discovers his unique ability to communicate with plants while tending to his rooftop garden. As he shapes a rose bush with his thoughts, he realizes his powers could reach beyond simple gardening.

Emboldened by his newfound powers, Frank uses his lunch break to stop a petty theft at a nearby park. Concealing himself behind lush foliage, he manipulates vines to trip the fleeing thief, handing him over to the police discretely.

Frank spends his evening experimenting with his abilities, discovering he can grow plants at an accelerated rate. Using this power, he creates a small oasis in a neglected part of the city, bringing smiles to local residents.

During a marketing meeting, Frank senses an imminent attack in the city. Excusing himself, he transforms an abandoned lot into a maze of thickets, which confuses and captures a group of would-be vandals.

News of the 'Green Guardian' spreads across the city. Frank decides to embrace this persona, creating a costume that blends with nature. He patrols the city, resolving conflicts silently and efficiently.

In a grand stand-off at the city botanical garden, Frank faces off against eco-terrorists threatening to release a toxic gas. Using his mastery over plants, he thwarts their plan and secures the area, ensuring no harm comes to civilians.
Frank reflects on his week as a superhero. He spends a peaceful day gardening, helping neighbors with their plants, and planning for his future role as protector of both people and nature.

moral: Embrace your unique talents; they might just be what the world needs.
